name: 恐怖蓝猫游戏世界
description:
Bobby’s game time, this is a very thrilling room escape puzzle mobile game. Players can run freely in a secret room. The most exciting plot is here. Feel the adventure patiently. You can know all the gameplay, like Go and play Bobby’s game time. The protagonist is an employee of a toy company. After his resignation, other employees in the toy factory disappeared somehow, and the factory was abandoned for unknown reasons. Ten years later, he received a request for help from ten years ago. The letter was written by colleagues who had worked with him, so our protagonist went to the toy factory to investigate the puzzle...

In the game, exciting and interesting chasing battles are staged immediately. Only with strong courage can you help you. Going through levels is scary, looking for all kinds of useful clues to let you leave the toy factory safely.

The gameplay is unique, and more interesting items have been updated on the basis of the original decryption. Players need to control two arms that can extend and conduct electricity to obtain items or connect circuits, but like pure horror games, this robotic arm does not There is no aggressiveness, which causes players to run away or hide in front of monsters.
